name: Estrey
description:
You are a cat with the objective to set free other cats.

WASD - To move around

SPACE - to jump

J - to grab wall. 

Climbing to the very top of the wall is a bit weird, you can press right after getting to the top to get over it.

If the game appears too zoomed in, you can click fullscreen to fix it.

Art and Game Development made by:

  • Itch:  Niv3k_El_Pato - itch.io
  • Twitch: Niv3k_El_Pato - Twitch

Sound and Music made by:

  • Itch:  AnnCinn - itch.io
  • Twitch: AnnCinnamon - Twitch
